chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:
items.plainText: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:

items.text: Grace be to you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
items.plainText: Grace be to you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

items.text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:
items.plainText: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:

items.text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:
items.plainText: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:

items.text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,
items.plainText: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,

items.text: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.
items.plainText: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.

items.text: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;
items.plainText: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

items.text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;
items.plainText: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;

items.text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:
items.plainText: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:

items.text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him:
items.plainText: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him:

items.text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:
items.plainText: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:

items.text: That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.
items.plainText: That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.

items.text: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,
items.plainText: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,

items.text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.
items.plainText: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

items.text: Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,
items.plainText: Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,

items.text: Cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;
items.plainText: Cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;

items.text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:
items.plainText: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:

items.text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
items.plainText: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

items.text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,
items.plainText: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,

items.text: Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places,
items.plainText: Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places,

items.text: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:
items.plainText: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:

items.text: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,
items.plainText: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,

items.text: Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
items.plainText: Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
